'''''Swift Slayer''''' is a basic daily [[commission]] that can occur in various areas of [[Inazuma]], [[Sumeru]] and [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A band of rogues has appeared out in the wild, threatening the safety of the surrounding area. Head over there and take them out.}}
# Complete Time Trial Challenge (0/1)

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
===Chinju Forest===
* On the shore east of [[Chinju Forest]], [[Narukami Island]]:
** Challenge Target: Defeat 1 enemy in 240 seconds.
** After every 20 seconds, a [[Chaos Cluster]] will spawn.
** Enemies: {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Dancing Thunder}}
*: <gallery>
Swift Slayer Chinju Forest Starting Location.png|Starting Location
</gallery>

===Narukami Island===
* [[Konda Village]] shore
** Challenge Target: Defeat the enemies within 240 seconds.
** Enemies: {{Enemy List|Thunderhelm Lawachurl/leader-[[attendant]] [[aura]];Electro Samachurl*2/optional to defeat}}
*: <gallery>
Swift Slayer Konda Village Starting Location.png|Starting Location
</gallery>
* Near a river north of [[Konda Village]] inland
** Challenge Target: Defeat all opponents within 240 seconds.
** Enemies: {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Electro Abyss Mage}}
** Notes:
*** Initially, both abyss mages have a green aura indicating that they will heal after dropping to low health.
*** After dropping to low health (under ~15% remaining), the mage will gain another green aura spiraling around it; 6 seconds later, it will restore ~50% of its own health. This ability can trigger once for each abyss mage; afterwards, the green auras will disappear.
*: <gallery>
Swift Slayer Narukami Island Starting Location.png|Starting Location
</gallery>

** Challenge Target: Defeat the enemies within 240 seconds.
** Enemies: {{Enemy List|Fatui Electro Cicin Mage/green leader-[[attendant]] [[aura]];Treasure Hoarders: Marksman*2/optional to defeat}}
